shipPart1: We ship most products nationwide, but
shipPart2: are available only in Los Angeles, Orange, and San Bernardino Counties.
slogan: Crafted by Hand, Inspired by You.
aboutText: We create handmade bouquets, gifts, ribbons, and apparel customized for every occasion. We currently make flower deliveries in Los Angeles County, Orange County, and San Bernardino County. Use our delivery calculator to check estimated delivery costs to your city.
mailtoCta: Click here to send us an email

reviews.name: Sofia Gomez
reviews.comment: Loved the custom ribbon, will order again.
